[ti:Bloody Valentine (Explicit)]

[00:00.00]Bloody Valentine (Explicit) - Machine Gun Kelly (机关枪凯利)
[00:04.15]Lyrics by：Travis Barker/Nicholas Alex Long/Colson Baker/Derek Ryan Smith
[00:08.30]Composed by：Travis Barker/Nicholas Alex Long/Colson Baker/Derek Ryan Smith
[00:12.45]The simulation just went bad but you're the best I ever had
[00:18.83]Like hand prints in wet cement she touch me it's permanent
[00:24.83]In my head in my head I couldn't hear anything you said but
[00:30.63]In my head in my head I'm calling you girlfriend what the f**k
[00:36.65]I don't do fake love but I'll take some from you tonight
[00:42.36]I know I've got to go but I might just miss the flight
[00:46.94]I can't stay forever let's play pretend
[00:50.35]And treat this night like it'll happen again
[00:53.36]You'll be my bloody valentine tonight
[01:03.06]I'm overstimulated and I'm sad
[01:06.82]I don't expect you to understand
[01:09.91]There's nothing less than true romance or am I just making a mess
[01:15.87]In my head in my head I'm lying naked with you yeah
[01:21.64]In my head in my head I'm ready to die holding your hand
[01:27.69]I don't do fake love but I'll take some from you tonight
[01:31.85]Take some from you tonight
[01:33.41]I know I've got to go but I might just miss the flight
[01:38.14]I can't stay forever let's play pretend
[01:41.23]And treat this night like it'll happen again
[01:44.13]You'll be my bloody valentine tonight
[02:06.65]I can't hide how I feel about you
[02:09.55]Inside I gave everything up
[02:12.57]Tonight if I could just have you
[02:15.61]Be my be my baby
[02:18.57]I can't hide how I feel about you
[02:21.11]I cannot hide these feelings
[02:21.95]Inside I gave everything up
[02:23.99])I cannot hide these feelings

[02:27.09]I gave up everything for you
[02:28.03]Be my be my
[02:29.65]I gave up everything
[02:33.11]Ayy
[02:33.64]I don't do fake love but I'll take some from you tonight
[02:37.74]Take some from you tonight
[02:39.34]I know I've got to go but I might just miss the flight
[02:44.05]I can't stay forever let's play pretend
[02:47.19]And treat this night like it'll happen again
[02:49.97]You'll be my bloody valentine tonight
[02:57.52]Na-na-na na-na-na na-na-na
[03:02.41]Just tonight
[03:03.53]Na-na-na na-na-na na-na-na

[ti:Bloody Valentine (Explicit)]
[ar:Machine Gun Kelly]
[al:Bloody Valentine (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]//
[00:04.15]//
[00:08.30]//
[00:12.45]自欺欺人让我愈发痛苦 可你是我拥有过的最好的恋人
[00:18.83]她的爱抚 犹如水泥未干时留下的手印 永远留在我心底
[00:24.83]在我的脑海里 在我的脑海里 我听不见你说的话
[00:30.63]在我的脑海里 在我的脑海里 我肆无忌惮地呼唤你的女友
[00:36.65]我不会虚情假意 可今晚我会从你身上得到满足
[00:42.36]我知道我得走了 否则我可能会错过航班
[00:46.94]我无法永远留在你身边 让我们欺骗自己
[00:50.35]珍惜今晚的时光 仿佛一切会再次发生
[00:53.36]今晚 你会是我挚爱的情人
[01:03.06]我高估自己 我伤心难过
[01:06.82]我不奢求你会明白

[01:44.13]今晚 你会是我挚爱的情人

[02:15.61]请成为我的挚爱
